metadata.titleEn: Data set of ecological adjustment value of Arctic permafrost change on ecology system from 1982 to 2015
metadata.titleCn: 北极多年冻土变化生态调节价值数据集（1982–2015）
metadata.description: The data set of ecological adjustment value of Arctic permafrost change from 1982 to 2015, with the time resolution of 1982, 2015 and the change rate of two phases, covers the entire Arctic tundra area, with the spatial resolution of 8km. Based on multi-source remote sensing, simulation, statistics and measured data, and combined with GIS and ecological methods, it quantifies the adjustment service value of Arctic permafrost to the ecosystem, The unit price refers to the correlation (0.35) between the active layer thickness and NDVI changes after excluding precipitation and snow water equivalent, and the grassland ecosystem service value (the unit price of tundra ecosystem service is based on 1/3 of the grassland ecosystem service value).
metadata.descriptionCn: 1982-2015年北极多年冻土变化生态调节价值数据集，时间分辨率为1982、2015两期以及两期变化率，覆盖范围为整个环北极苔原区，空间分辨率为8km，以多源遥感、模拟、统计和实测数据为基础，使用GIS方法和生态学方法结合，量化了北极多年冻土对生态系统的调节服务价值，单价参考了剔除降水和雪水当量后的活动层厚度与NDVI变化相关性（0.35）及其草地生态系统服务价值（苔原生态系统服务单价以1/3草地生态系统服务价值为标准）。
metadata.instructions:
File name: The Arctic permafrost change ecological adjustment value data set is stored in text format. The file name is "yyyydd.txt", where yyyy represents the year and ddd represents Julian date.
Data reading method: All ASCII code files in the data set can be directly opened with a text program (such as Notepad). Except for the header file, the main content is a numerical representation of the ecological adjustment value of Arctic permafrost changes. If it is necessary to display it with a diagram, it can be opened with Arcgis. During the reading process, a file in grid format will be generated, and the displayed grid file is the graphical representation of the ASCII code file.
metadata.instructionsCn:
文件命名：北极多年冻土变化生态调节价值数据集以文本格式存储，文件的名称为“yyyyddd.txt”，其中yyyy代表年。

数据读取方式：该数据集中的所有ASCII码文件可以直接用文本程序（如记事本）打开，除了头文件，主体内容为数值表征北极多年冻土变化生态调节价值，如果要用图示来显示的话，可用Arcgis打开，在读取过程中会生成grid格式的文件，所显示的grid文件就是该ASCII码文件的图形表达。

background: Permafrost is a subsurface phenomenon that underlies a significant part of the land and sea in the Northern Hemisphere. Permafrost stores large amounts of organic carbon, affects the stability of bedrock and unconsolidated sediments, and impacts the costs and methods used for infrastructure development. Despite its global significance, there is still no method to reliably detect the occurrence and extent of permafrost at medium to high spatial resolutions and at a global scale. The first comprehensive Northern Hemisphere permafrost extent map was compiled by Brown et al. (1997), based on national and regional maps and expert knowledge from different time periods and sources. High-resolution maps (up to 1km2) have been successfully produced using the TTOP (temperature at the top of permafrost) model for individual regions and countries. The TTOP approach uses only a small number of input parameters and has been successfully employed at regional and continental scales for Canada, Scandinavia, and China.
research objective: In this study, we extend and improve the remote sensing approach of Westermann et al. (2015a) and apply a TTOP–based scheme to the entire Northern Hemisphere. We compile the first permafrost temperature and zonation map at the circum-Arctic scale with a resolution of 1km2 that includes a statistical representation of subpixel variability of permafrost temperatures based on snow and landcover heterogeneity.
challenges: Despite its global significance, there is still no method to reliably detect the occurrence and extent of permafrost at medium to high spatial resolutions and at a global scale. Extrapolating these observations to larger regions is hampered by the considerable spatial variability of the ground thermal regime and an uneven distribution of sites that results in extensive unsampled areas.
methods: For calculation of mean annual ground temperature (MAGT), we use the CryoGrid 1 model, based on the TTOP equilibrium approach. We compile spatially distributed datasets of TDD and FDD from remotely sensed land surface temperature (LST) products. We employ the MODIS MOD11A1 and MYD11A1 level 3 product in processing version 6, which contains up to two daytime and two night-time measurements per day. Downscaling of the ERA-interim reanalysis data to the 1km2 resolution of individual MODIS pixels is accomplished by computing atmospheric lapse rates and the elevation difference between the ERA orography field and the elevation of a 1km2 pixel. We compare our ensemble MAGT mean to in-situ point measurements in 359 boreholes in the GTN-P and 392 boreholes in the TSP project network. The model calculates mean annual ground temperature (MAGT) at the top of the permafrost based on mean annual air temperature (MAAT) and uses semi-empirical adjustment factors for the effects of snow cover and the thermal offset.
dataset: We compile spatially distributed datasets of TDD and FDD from remotely sensed land surface temperature (LST) products. The Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometers (MODIS) on board the Terra and Aqua satellites have provided LST measurements at a spatial resolution of 1km2 since 2000 and 2002, respectively. The study period, therefore, starts in 2000 and extends to the end of 2016. Extended data gaps in the MODIS LST time series due to cloud cover can result in a systematic cold bias in seasonal averages.
findings: The accuracy of the modelled mean annual ground temperature (MAGT) at the top of the permafrost is ±2°C when compared to permafrost borehole data. The modelled permafrost area (MAGT<0°C) covers 13.9×106 km2 (ca. 15% of the exposed land area), which is within the range or slightly below the average of previous estimates. The sum of all pixels having isolated patches, sporadic, discontinuous or continuous permafrost (permafrost probability>0) is around 21×106 km2 (22% of exposed land area), which is approximately 2×106 km2 less than estimated previously.
backgroundCn: 永冻土是一种地下现象，覆盖了北半球大量的陆地和海洋。永冻土储存着大量的有机碳，影响着基岩和松散沉积物的稳定性，并对基础设施开发的成本和方法产生影响。尽管其全球重要性显著，但目前仍没有可靠的方法能够在全球范围内以中到高的空间分辨率检测永冻土的存在和范围。Brown等人（1997）编制了第一幅全面的北半球永冻土分布图，该图基于不同时间段和来源的国家和区域地图以及专家知识。利用TTOP（永冻土顶部温度）模型，已经成功地为个别地区和国家制作了高分辨率地图（高达1km²）。TTOP方法仅使用少量输入参数，并已成功应用于加拿大、斯堪的纳维亚和中国的区域和大陆尺度。
research objectiveCn: 在本研究中，我们扩展并改进了Westermann等人（2015a）提出的遥感方法，并将基于TTOP的方案应用于整个北半球。我们编制了第一个以1km²分辨率的环极区范围的永久冻土温度和分区图，其中包括基于雪和土地覆盖异质性的永久冻土温度的亚像素变异性统计表示。
challengesCn: 尽管其全球意义重大，但目前仍没有可靠的方法在全球范围内以中到高的空间分辨率检测永久冻土的发生和范围。将这些观测结果外推到更大区域受到地面热状态的显著空间变异性和站点分布不均的限制，导致存在大量未采样区域。
methodsCn: 为了计算平均年地温（MAGT），我们使用基于TTOP平衡方法的CryoGrid 1模型。我们编制了来自遥感地表温度（LST）产品的空间分布数据集，包括累积温度度日（TDD）和冷却度日（FDD）。我们采用MODIS MOD11A1和MYD11A1第6版的水平3产品进行处理，该产品每天包含最多两个白天和两个夜间的测量。通过计算大气温度递减率和ERA地形场与1km²像素的海拔差异，将ERA-interim再分析数据下采样到1km²的分辨率。我们将我们的集成MAGT均值与GTN-P网络中的359个钻孔和TSP项目网络中的392个钻孔的现场点测量进行比较。该模型基于平均年气温（MAAT）计算冻土顶部的平均年地温（MAGT），并使用半经验调整因子来考虑雪盖和热偏移的影响。
datasetCn: 我们编制了来自遥感地表温度（LST）产品的空间分布数据集，包括日间温度差（TDD）和夜间温度差（FDD）。自2000年和2002年以来，搭载在Terra和Aqua卫星上的中分辨率成像光谱仪（MODIS）提供了1km²空间分辨率的LST测量。因此，研究期从2000年开始，延续到2016年底。由于云层覆盖，MODIS LST时间序列中存在较长的数据缺口，这可能导致季节平均值出现系统性的低温偏差。
findingsCn: 模型化的年均地温（MAGT）在永久冻土顶部的准确度与永久冻土钻孔数据相比为±2°C。模型化的永久冻土面积（MAGT<0°C）覆盖13.9×10^6 km²（约占暴露陆地面积的15%），这一数值在之前估计的范围内或略低于平均值。所有具有孤立斑块、零星、间歇性或连续永久冻土（永久冻土概率>0）的像素总和约为21×10^6 km²（占暴露陆地面积的22%），这比之前的估计少约2×10^6 km²。

Verification.QuestionEn: Can the TTOP approach be applied at regional and continental scales for mapping permafrost extent?
Verification.QuestionCn: TTOP方法可以在区域和大陆尺度上应用于永久冻土范围的制图吗？

Verification.QuestionEn: Is the accuracy of modelled mean annual ground temperature (MAGT) within ±2°C when compared to borehole data in permafrost studies?
Verification.QuestionCn: 在永久冻土研究中，模型化的年均地面温度（MAGT）与钻孔数据相比，其准确性是否在±2°C范围内？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: When assessing permafrost extent, is the primary challenge more related to spatial variability, insufficient data points, or high-resolution mapping techniques?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 在评估永久冻土的范围时，主要挑战是与空间变异性、数据点不足还是高分辨率制图技术相关？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Are datasets for permafrost temperature and zonation more commonly derived from MODIS, ERA-interim reanalysis, or in-situ borehole measurements?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 关于永久冻土温度和分区的数据集更常见的是来自MODIS、ERA-interim再分析，还是现场钻孔测量？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What is the basis for quantifying the ecological regulation value of Arctic permafrost in a dataset?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 量化北极永冻土生态调节价值的数据集的基础是什么？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a method used to calculate mean annual ground temperature (MAGT) in permafrost regions?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于计算永久冻土地区平均年地温（MAGT）的方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: The CryoGrid 1 model, based on the TTOP equilibrium approach, is used for calculating mean annual ground temperature (MAGT) at the top of the permafrost. This method utilizes spatially distributed datasets of thawing degree days (TDD) and freezing degree days (FDD) derived from remotely sensed land surface temperature (LST) products.
Example.AnswerCn: CryoGrid 1模型基于TTOP平衡方法，用于计算永久冻土顶部的年均地温（MAGT）。该方法利用从遥感地表温度（LST）产品中获得的空间分布的融化度日（TDD）和冻结度日（FDD）数据集。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced when detecting permafrost at medium to high spatial resolutions?
Example.QuestionCn: 在中到高空间分辨率下检测永久冻土时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A challenge in detecting permafrost at medium to high spatial resolutions is the considerable spatial variability of the ground thermal regime and the uneven distribution of observation sites, which leads to extensive unsampled areas, making it difficult to extrapolate observations to larger regions.
Example.AnswerCn: 在中到高空间分辨率下检测永久冻土的一个挑战是地面热状态的显著空间变异性以及观测点分布的不均匀性，这导致了广泛的未采样区域，使得将观测结果外推到更大区域变得困难。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you provide an example of how cloud cover affects the data collected for permafrost studies using satellite remote sensing?
Example.QuestionCn: 你能举一个例子说明云层覆盖如何影响使用卫星遥感收集的多年冻土研究数据吗？
Example.AnswerEn: Extended data gaps in the MODIS LST time series due to cloud cover can result in a systematic cold bias in seasonal averages, which affects the accuracy of datasets compiled for studying permafrost.
Example.AnswerCn: 由于云层覆盖，MODIS LST 时间序列中的延长数据缺口可能导致季节平均值出现系统性的冷偏差，这影响了用于研究永久冻土的数据集的准确性。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What properties are essential for datasets used to model permafrost temperature and zonation at a circum-Arctic scale?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于在环极地区建模永久冻土温度和分区的数据集所需的基本属性是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: spatially distributed data of thawing degree days (TDD), freezing degree days (FDD), remotely sensed land surface temperature (LST) products, snow and landcover heterogeneity, statistical representation of subpixel variability, resolution around 1km2
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 空间分布的融化度日（TDD）、冻结度日（FDD）、遥感地表温度（LST）产品、雪和地表覆盖异质性、亚像素变异性的统计表示，分辨率约为1平方公里。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the key characteristics of the data collection method that utilizes the TTOP-based scheme for detecting permafrost extent and temperature?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 利用TTOP基础方案检测永久冻土范围和温度的数据收集方法的关键特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: mean annual ground temperature (MAGT), CryoGrid 1 model, TTOP equilibrium approach, mean annual air temperature (MAAT), semi-empirical adjustment factors for snow cover and thermal offset effects, downscaling ERA-interim reanalysis data, 1km2 resolution of MODIS pixels
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 多年平均地温（MAGT），CryoGrid 1模型，TTOP平衡方法，年平均气温（MAAT），用于雪盖和热偏移效应的半经验调整因子，下采样ERA-interim再分析数据，MODIS像素的1平方公里分辨率。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What challenges influence the reliability of permafrost detection methods at medium to high spatial resolutions?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 影响中高空间分辨率永久冻土探测方法可靠性的挑战有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: considerable spatial variability of the ground thermal regime, uneven distribution of observation sites, data gaps in MODIS LST time series due to cloud cover, systematic cold bias in seasonal averages
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 地面热状况的空间变化显著，观测站点分布不均，云层覆盖导致MODIS地表温度时间序列存在数据缺口，季节平均值存在系统性冷偏差。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many boreholes were used for in-situ point measurements to compare against modelled mean annual ground temperature (MAGT)?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 用于与模型化的年均地温（MAGT）进行比较的原位点测量的钻孔数量是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the percentage of exposed land area covered by the modelled permafrost area with mean annual ground temperature (MAGT) less than 0°C?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 模型化的多年冻土区域中，平均年地温（MAGT）低于0°C的暴露土地面积所占百分比是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'TTOP-based scheme' refer to in the context of permafrost mapping?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在多年冻土制图的背景下，“TTOP-based scheme”指的是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: A 'TTOP-based scheme' refers to a method used for permafrost mapping that involves the TTOP (temperature at the top of permafrost) model. This approach uses a limited set of input parameters to calculate mean annual ground temperature (MAGT) at the top of the permafrost. It has been applied at regional and continental scales and is extended for use at the circum-Arctic scale to compile permafrost temperature and zonation maps with high spatial resolution.
Definition.AnswerCn: “TTOP基础方案”是指一种用于永久冻土制图的方法，该方法涉及TTOP（永久冻土顶部温度）模型。该方法使用有限的一组输入参数来计算永久冻土顶部的年均地温（MAGT）。它已在区域和大陆尺度上应用，并扩展用于环北极尺度，以编制具有高空间分辨率的永久冻土温度和分区图。

Definition.QuestionEn: What are 'subpixel variability' and its relevance in permafrost temperature mapping?
Definition.QuestionCn: 什么是“子像素变异性”，以及它在永久冻土温度测绘中的相关性是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: 'Subpixel variability' in the context of permafrost temperature mapping refers to the statistical representation of variations in permafrost temperatures within a single pixel of a map, based on factors such as snow and land cover heterogeneity. This concept is relevant as it helps in capturing the spatial variability in the thermal regime of permafrost, which is crucial for accurate mapping at high resolutions.
Definition.AnswerCn: “亚像素变异性”在永久冻土温度映射的背景下，指的是基于雪和土地覆盖异质性等因素，在地图的单个像素内对永久冻土温度变化的统计表示。这个概念是相关的，因为它有助于捕捉永久冻土热状态的空间变异性，这对于高分辨率的准确映射至关重要。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'spatially distributed datasets of TDD and FDD' mean in remote sensing of permafrost?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在多年冻土的遥感中，“TDD和FDD的空间分布数据集”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: 'Spatially distributed datasets of TDD and FDD' refer to datasets that provide information on thawing degree days (TDD) and freezing degree days (FDD) across different geographical locations. These datasets are derived from remotely sensed land surface temperature (LST) products, such as those obtained from the MODIS satellites, and are used to model mean annual ground temperature (MAGT) to assess permafrost conditions.
Definition.AnswerCn: “空间分布的数据集中的融化度日（TDD）和冻结度日（FDD）”是指提供不同地理位置上融化度日和冻结度日信息的数据集。这些数据集是从遥感的地表温度（LST）产品中获得的，例如来自MODIS卫星的数据，并用于模拟年均地温（MAGT），以评估永久冻土条件。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can remote sensing techniques be effectively utilized to improve the reliability of detecting permafrost occurrence and extent at medium to high spatial resolutions globally?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 如何有效利用遥感技术提高全球中高分辨率下检测永久冻土发生和范围的可靠性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Remote sensing techniques, such as the use of MODIS LST products, are employed to compile spatially distributed datasets of TDD and FDD. These datasets are used in conjunction with models like CryoGrid 1, which utilizes the TTOP equilibrium approach to calculate mean annual ground temperatures. This approach allows for the extension and improvement of remote sensing applications to map permafrost temperature and zonation at a circum-Arctic scale with a resolution of 1km2.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 遥感技术，如MODIS LST产品的使用，被用来编制TDD和FDD的空间分布数据集。这些数据集与CryoGrid 1等模型结合使用，该模型利用TTOP平衡方法计算年均地温。这种方法使得遥感应用得以扩展和改进，以在1km²的分辨率下绘制环极地区的永冻土温度和分区。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What are the challenges faced in extrapolating data on permafrost to larger regions, and how can these be addressed through data collection methods?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在将多年冻土数据外推到更大区域时面临的挑战是什么，以及如何通过数据收集方法来解决这些挑战？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: One of the key challenges is the considerable spatial variability of the ground thermal regime and the uneven distribution of measurement sites, leading to extensive unsampled areas. Addressing these challenges involves using a combination of remote sensing data, such as MODIS LST, and models like CryoGrid 1 to estimate permafrost temperatures, while also considering snow cover and landcover heterogeneity to improve statistical representation of subpixel variability.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 一个关键挑战是地面热状况的显著空间变异性以及测量点的不均匀分布，导致大量未采样区域。解决这些挑战需要结合遥感数据，如MODIS地表温度（LST），以及像CryoGrid 1这样的模型来估算永久冻土温度，同时考虑雪盖和土地覆盖的异质性，以改善亚像素变异性的统计表示。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the challenge in reliably detecting the occurrence and extent of permafrost at medium to high spatial resolutions on a global scale?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在全球范围内，以中到高空间分辨率可靠检测永久冻土的发生和范围的挑战原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The challenge is caused by the considerable spatial variability of the ground thermal regime and an uneven distribution of sites, which results in extensive unsampled areas.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 这一挑战是由于地面热状态的显著空间变异性和站点分布不均，导致了广泛的未采样区域。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why do extended data gaps in MODIS LST time series due to cloud cover result in biases in seasonal averages when modeling permafrost extent?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么由于云层覆盖导致的MODIS LST时间序列中的长期数据缺失会在模拟多年冻土范围时导致季节平均值的偏差？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Extended data gaps lead to a systematic cold bias in seasonal averages because of the inability to consistently capture land surface temperatures, which are crucial for calculating mean annual ground temperatures.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 延长的数据缺口导致季节平均值出现系统性的寒冷偏差，因为无法持续捕捉地表温度，而地表温度对于计算年均地温至关重要。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How might the spatial variability of ground thermal regimes affect the outcomes of permafrost temperature and zonation mapping?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 地下热场的空间变异性如何影响永久冻土温度和分区制图的结果？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The considerable spatial variability of ground thermal regimes can result in extensive unsampled areas, which hampers the extrapolation of observations to larger regions. This variability can lead to inaccuracies in temperature and zonation mapping, making it difficult to achieve consistent results at medium to high spatial resolutions at a global scale.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 地面热状态的显著空间变异性可能导致广泛的未采样区域，这妨碍了将观察结果外推到更大区域。这种变异性可能导致温度和分区映射的不准确，使得在全球范围内以中到高空间分辨率获得一致结果变得困难。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What could be the implications of employing the TTOP-based scheme on the accuracy of permafrost monitoring across the Northern Hemisphere?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 采用TTOP基础方案对北半球永久冻土监测的准确性可能产生的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Employing the TTOP-based scheme, which utilizes input parameters such as temperature at the top of the permafrost, can improve the reliability of permafrost temperature and zonation maps. This method can offer a high-resolution overview, accounting for snow and land cover heterogeneity, and potentially lead to more precise models of permafrost area and temperature, thus supporting better understanding and management of these regions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 采用基于TTOP的方案，利用如永久冻土顶部温度等输入参数，可以提高永久冻土温度和分区图的可靠性。这种方法可以提供高分辨率的概览，考虑到雪和土地覆盖的异质性，并可能导致对永久冻土面积和温度的更精确模型，从而支持对这些地区的更好理解和管理。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the main objective of using remote sensing data to quantify the ecological regulation value of permafrost changes in the Arctic tundra?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 使用遥感数据量化北极苔原中永冻土变化的生态调节价值的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objective is to quantify the Arctic permafrost's ecological regulation service value by integrating multi-source remote sensing, simulation, statistical, and measured data using GIS and ecological methods. This involves assessing the correlation between active layer thickness, NDVI changes, and their relation to the ecosystem service value of tundra.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是通过整合多源遥感、模拟、统计和测量数据，利用GIS和生态方法量化北极永冻土的生态调节服务价值。这涉及评估活层厚度、NDVI变化与苔原生态系统服务价值之间的相关性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is there a focus on creating a high-resolution permafrost map for the Northern Hemisphere using the TTOP-based scheme?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 为什么要使用TTOP基础方案创建北半球高分辨率的永久冻土地图？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The focus is on extending and improving remote sensing approaches to compile a Northern Hemisphere permafrost temperature and zonation map at a circum-Arctic scale with high resolution. This addresses the challenge of reliably detecting permafrost extent and occurrence at medium to high spatial resolutions globally, considering the spatial variability and distribution challenges.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 重点是扩展和改进遥感方法，以在环北极范围内编制高分辨率的北半球永久冻土温度和分区图。这解决了在全球范围内以中到高空间分辨率可靠检测永久冻土范围和分布的挑战，考虑到空间变异性和分布的挑战。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What data collection methods are employed to quantify the ecological regulation value of Arctic permafrost changes over the given time period?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在给定时间段内，量化北极永冻土变化的生态调节价值所采用的数据收集方法有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The methods used to quantify the ecological regulation value of Arctic permafrost changes include the integration of multi-source remote sensing data, simulation, statistical, and empirical data. Geographical Information System (GIS) techniques and ecological methods are combined to assess the changes, taking into account the correlation between active layer thickness, NDVI changes, and grassland ecosystem service values.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 量化北极永冻土变化的生态调节价值的方法包括整合多源遥感数据、模拟、统计和实证数据。地理信息系统（GIS）技术与生态方法相结合，以评估变化，考虑活层厚度、NDVI变化与草地生态系统服务价值之间的相关性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How does the TTOP-based scheme facilitate the development of permafrost temperature and zonation maps at a circum-Arctic scale?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: TTOP基础方案如何促进在整个北极地区开发永久冻土温度和分区图？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The TTOP-based scheme extends the remote sensing approach by compiling spatially distributed datasets of Thawing Degree Days (TDD) and Freezing Degree Days (FDD) using MODIS land surface temperature products. The scheme calculates mean annual ground temperature (MAGT) at the top of the permafrost by integrating atmospheric lapse rates and elevation differences. This process allows the creation of permafrost temperature and zonation maps at a resolution of 1km2.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: TTOP基础方案通过编制分布式的融化度日（TDD）和冻结度日（FDD）数据集，扩展了遥感方法，使用MODIS地表温度产品。该方案通过整合大气垂直温度梯度和海拔差异，计算出永久冻土顶部的年均地温（MAGT）。这一过程使得能够以1km²的分辨率创建永久冻土温度和分区图。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural challenges are associated with extrapolating permafrost extent to larger areas, and how are these addressed?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 将永久冻土范围外推到更大区域时，涉及哪些程序性挑战，以及如何解决这些挑战？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Extrapolating permafrost extent to larger areas is challenged by considerable spatial variability in the ground thermal regime and uneven distribution of observation sites. These challenges are addressed by employing statistical representations of subpixel variability based on snow and landcover heterogeneity, and using the CryoGrid 1 model to adjust for snow cover and thermal offset effects in calculating MAGT.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 将永久冻土范围外推到更大区域面临着地面热状态的显著空间变异性和观测站点分布不均的挑战。通过基于雪和土地覆盖异质性的亚像素变异性统计表示，以及使用CryoGrid 1模型来调整雪覆盖和热偏差效应以计算多年平均地温（MAGT），来应对这些挑战。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What remote sensing technologies enable the high-resolution mapping of permafrost extent and temperature variability in the Arctic region?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些遥感技术能够实现对北极地区永久冻土范围和温度变化的高分辨率映射？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The use of Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometers (MODIS) on board the Terra and Aqua satellites provides land surface temperature (LST) measurements at a spatial resolution of 1km2, enabling the high-resolution mapping of permafrost extent and temperature variability in the Arctic region. Additionally, the TTOP equilibrium approach and CryoGrid 1 model are employed to calculate mean annual ground temperature (MAGT).
Enablement.AnswerCn: 中等分辨率成像光谱仪（MODIS）搭载在Terra和Aqua卫星上，提供1km²空间分辨率的地表温度（LST）测量，使得在北极地区高分辨率绘制永冻土的分布和温度变化成为可能。此外，TTOP平衡方法和CryoGrid 1模型被用来计算年均地温（MAGT）。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do statistical methods and spatial downscaling contribute to the accuracy of permafrost temperature datasets?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 统计方法和空间下采样如何提高永久冻土温度数据集的准确性？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Statistical methods contribute by providing a representation of subpixel variability of permafrost temperatures based on snow and landcover heterogeneity. Spatial downscaling of ERA-interim reanalysis data to a 1km2 resolution involves calculating atmospheric lapse rates and the elevation differences between ERA orography fields and MODIS pixels, which enhances the accuracy of permafrost temperature datasets.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 统计方法通过提供基于雪和土地覆盖异质性的永久冻土温度的亚像素变异性表示来贡献。将ERA-Interim再分析数据空间下采样到1km²分辨率涉及计算大气垂直温度梯度和ERA地形场与MODIS像素之间的高程差异，从而提高永久冻土温度数据集的准确性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What challenges must be overcome to expand the spatial coverage of permafrost data collection in the Northern Hemisphere?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 为了扩大北半球永久冻土数据收集的空间覆盖范围，必须克服哪些挑战？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Challenges include the considerable spatial variability of the ground thermal regime and the uneven distribution of observational sites, which result in extensive unsampled areas. Additionally, extended data gaps in the MODIS LST time series due to cloud cover can introduce systematic biases, making it difficult to expand the spatial coverage of permafrost data collection.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 挑战包括地面热状况的显著空间变异性和观测站点的不均匀分布，这导致了广泛的未采样区域。此外，由于云层覆盖，MODIS LST时间序列中存在较长的数据缺口，这可能引入系统性偏差，使得扩展永久冻土数据收集的空间覆盖变得困难。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might a dataset of permafrost extent and temperature fail to capture the full spatial variability of permafrost conditions?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 一个关于永久冻土范围和温度的数据集可能无法捕捉永久冻土条件的全部空间变异性的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Extrapolating observations to larger regions is hampered by the considerable spatial variability of the ground thermal regime and an uneven distribution of sites, resulting in extensive unsampled areas.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 将观察结果外推到更大区域时，受到地面热状况的显著空间变异性和站点分布不均的影响，导致存在大量未采样区域。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What challenges could arise when using remote sensing data to estimate mean annual ground temperature (MAGT) in permafrost regions?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在使用遥感数据估计永久冻土地区的年均地面温度（MAGT）时，可能会出现哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Extended data gaps in the remotely sensed land surface temperature (LST) time series due to cloud cover can result in a systematic cold bias in seasonal averages.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 由于云层覆盖，遥感地表温度（LST）时间序列中的延长数据缺口可能导致季节平均值出现系统性的冷偏差。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might a research approach based on mean annual air temperature (MAAT) and snow cover adjustments be inadequate for modeling permafrost temperature accurately?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 基于年均气温（MAAT）和雪盖调整的研究方法可能不足以准确建模永冻土温度的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The accuracy of the modelled mean annual ground temperature (MAGT) is ±2°C when compared to permafrost borehole data, indicating potential limitations in capturing the full complexity of the thermal effects of snow cover and other factors.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 模型化的年均地温（MAGT）与永久冻土钻孔数据相比，其准确度为±2°C，这表明在捕捉雪盖及其他因素的热效应的复杂性方面可能存在潜在的局限性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of using remote sensing techniques for the spatial distribution of permafrost temperatures in the Northern Hemisphere?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估遥感技术在北半球永久冻土温度空间分布中的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The use of remote sensing techniques, specifically the TTOP-based scheme, has been effective in compiling the first permafrost temperature and zonation map at a circum-Arctic scale with a resolution of 1km2. The approach allows for a statistical representation of subpixel variability of permafrost temperatures based on snow and landcover heterogeneity, which is a significant advancement in addressing the spatial variability of the ground thermal regime.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用遥感技术，特别是基于TTOP的方案，在以1km²的分辨率编制首个环极地区的永久冻土温度和分区图方面取得了有效成果。这种方法能够基于雪和土地覆盖的异质性对永久冻土温度的亚像素变异性进行统计表示，这在解决地面热状态的空间变异性方面是一个重要的进展。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the perceived challenges in compiling datasets of permafrost extent and temperature at medium to high spatial resolutions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在中到高空间分辨率下编制永久冻土范围和温度数据集时，面临的感知挑战有哪些？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The challenges include the considerable spatial variability of the ground thermal regime and an uneven distribution of observation sites, leading to extensive unsampled areas. Furthermore, extended data gaps in MODIS LST time series due to cloud cover can result in a systematic cold bias in seasonal averages, complicating the extrapolation of observations to larger regions.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 挑战包括地面热状况的显著空间变异性和观测点的不均匀分布，导致大量未采样区域。此外，由于云层覆盖，MODIS LST时间序列中存在较长的数据缺口，这可能导致季节平均值的系统性冷偏差，从而使观测结果向更大区域的外推变得复杂。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, what are the potential benefits of integrating multiple data sources, such as remotely sensed and in-situ measurements, for studying permafrost changes?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在您看来，整合多个数据源，例如遥感和现场测量，对于研究永久冻土变化有哪些潜在好处？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Integrating multiple data sources, such as remotely sensed land surface temperature products and in-situ borehole measurements, provides a more comprehensive understanding of permafrost changes. This approach enhances the accuracy of modeled mean annual ground temperature (MAGT) at the top of the permafrost, which has shown an accuracy of ±2°C. It also allows for a more reliable estimation of the permafrost area and its probability, which is crucial for understanding its ecological regulation value.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 整合多个数据源，如遥感地表温度产品和现场钻孔测量，能够更全面地理解永久冻土的变化。这种方法提高了对永久冻土顶部年均地温（MAGT）模型的准确性，准确度达到±2°C。同时，它还允许对永久冻土面积及其概率进行更可靠的估计，这对于理解其生态调节价值至关重要。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of the challenges faced in detecting permafrost extent with high spatial resolution across the Northern Hemisphere.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解在北半球以高空间分辨率检测永久冻土范围所面临的挑战。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Challenges include the considerable spatial variability in ground thermal regimes and the uneven distribution of measurement sites, which lead to unsampled areas. The lack of a reliable method at global scale and medium to high spatial resolutions adds to the difficulty.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 挑战包括地面热状况的显著空间变异性和测量点的不均匀分布，这导致了未采样区域的出现。在全球范围内缺乏可靠的方法以及中到高空间分辨率的情况也增加了困难。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please describe how remote sensing techniques can be integrated with ecological methods to quantify the ecological regulation value of permafrost changes in the Arctic region.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请描述如何将遥感技术与生态方法结合起来，以量化北极地区永冻土变化的生态调节价值。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The integration of remote sensing techniques with ecological methods involves using multi-source remote sensing data, simulations, statistical data, and field measurements to analyze changes in permafrost and their impact on ecological regulation. GIS and ecological methods are combined to quantify the ecological regulation value, with reference to the correlation between changes in active layer thickness and NDVI, which influences the valuation of tundra ecosystem services.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 遥感技术与生态方法的结合涉及使用多源遥感数据、模拟、统计数据和实地测量来分析永冻土的变化及其对生态调节的影响。GIS与生态方法相结合，量化生态调节价值，参考活层厚度变化与NDVI之间的相关性，这影响了苔原生态系统服务的评估。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please provide an analysis of the challenges encountered in detecting permafrost occurrence and extent at medium to high spatial resolutions on a global scale.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请提供对在全球范围内以中到高空间分辨率检测永久冻土的发生和范围所遇到的挑战的分析。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The challenges include the considerable spatial variability of the ground thermal regime and the uneven distribution of sampling sites, leading to vast unsampled areas. Reliable detection is hampered by the lack of a consistent method to capture permafrost occurrences at these spatial resolutions globally. Additionally, extrapolating observations is difficult due to these variabilities.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 挑战包括地面热状态的显著空间变异性和采样点的不均匀分布，导致存在大量未采样区域。由于缺乏一致的方法在全球范围内以这些空间分辨率捕捉永久冻土的出现，可靠的检测受到阻碍。此外，由于这些变异性，外推观测结果也变得困难。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please outline the process of compiling spatially distributed datasets from remotely sensed land surface temperature products for permafrost temperature modeling.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 概述从遥感地表温度产品中编制空间分布数据集以进行永久冻土温度建模的过程。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The process involves using the CryoGrid 1 model based on the TTOP equilibrium approach to calculate mean annual ground temperature (MAGT). Remotely sensed land surface temperature (LST) data from MODIS products are used to compile datasets of thawing degree days (TDD) and freezing degree days (FDD). Downscaling ERA-interim reanalysis data to 1km2 resolution is achieved by computing atmospheric lapse rates and adjusting for elevation differences between ERA orography and MODIS pixels.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 该过程涉及使用基于TTOP平衡方法的CryoGrid 1模型来计算年均地温（MAGT）。利用MODIS产品的遥感地表温度（LST）数据编制融化度日（TDD）和冻结度日（FDD）数据集。通过计算大气垂直温度梯度并调整ERA地形与MODIS像素之间的海拔差异，将ERA-interim再分析数据降尺度到1km²分辨率。
